info.title: Pandac POS API
info.description:
API for managing products, inventory, sales, transactions, and employees in a POS system.

    **Versioning Strategy**: This API follows semantic versioning. The version is
    indicated in the base path (`/v1`). Backward-incompatible changes will result
    in a major version increment.

post.description:
User login endpoint.

Returns access and refresh tokens upon successful authentication.

User registration endpoint.

Allows new users to register without authentication.
Creates a new user account with default 'user' role and returns user information.

User logout endpoint.

In a production environment, you would typically blacklist the token.
Refresh access token using refresh token.

get.description: List users (admin and manager access only)

schema.title: Response List Users V1 Users  Get
Response Read Roles V1 Roles  Get

post.description:
Create new role.
Requires admin role.

put.description:
Update a role.
Requires admin role.

delete.description:
Delete a role.
Requires admin role.

schema.title: Response Read Products V1 Products  Get
Response Delete Product V1 Products  Product Id  Delete
Response Read Customers V1 Customers  Get
Response Delete Customer V1 Customers  Customer Id  Delete

get.description: Get sale by ID with eager loading of relationships.
Get revenue analytics for a date range.
Get top selling products for a date range.

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Number of top products to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Number of top products to return

get.description: Get daily sales summary for a specific date.

schema.title: Response Get Sale Items V1 Sales  Sale Id  Items Get

get.description: Get stock levels for all products.
Search suppliers by name. If no name provided, returns all suppliers.

schema.title: Response Read Purchase Orders V1 Inventory Purchase Orders  Get

post.description: Adjust stock levels (can be positive or negative).

get.description: Get sales report for a date range

schema.title: Response Get Sales Report V1 Reports Sales Get

get.description: Get daily sales report for a specific date

schema.title: Response Get Daily Sales Report V1 Reports Sales Daily Get

get.description: Get period sales report with flexible parameter names
